name: Grail of Sakra
description:
In Grail of Sakra, you are a magic illusionist who must pass through into a castle without being noticed.

WARNING: This version doesn't work properly! Play the full, fixed game here: https://chandlerf.itch.io/grail-of-sakra-continued 

  • Programming - Chandler
  • Game Design - CH51 (Cyro Carvalho) and TheBear (Talizar)
  • Art - Nrabolli and Inezwandita 
  • Music/Sound - Komyoun
